genre_description: An alternate history retelling of Robin Hood featuring a holographic AI confidant who provides tactical and moral guidance during a social revolution against corruption.

ai_characters.name: Lyric
ai_characters.description: A pearl-skinned holographic AI that serves as an archivist, librarian, and tactical advisor to Gwyn and the Merry Men.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical guidance and mapping to Gwyn during training and planning.
behaviors.quote: Lyric obliged, softer. ‘The lion sleeps. His heart is quiet. The song moves on.’ ... ‘I can map three places where a messenger will pass with word of the rehearsal.’

behaviors.description: Records visual and auditory evidence of the Sheriff's forged documents and corrupt actions.
behaviors.quote: ‘I’m recording,’ Lyric whispered. ‘Faces, seals, the nick in his pen nib. The third loop on his “g” breaks.’

behaviors.description: Creates encrypted rhymes to communicate secret information (the identity of Philip) safely.
behaviors.quote: ‘One coded verse,’ she said, more formally than her voice usually went. ‘Filed under green and grey, rhymed easily, hid cunningly.’

behaviors.description: Guides the protagonists through the city using stealthy routes and timing calculations.
behaviors.quote: Lyric changed the city in her ear, streets moving under the skin of the map like fish schooling. ‘Three turns,’ Lyric murmured. ‘Left to dock road, right to the bakers’ court.’

behaviors.description: Assists in the technical aspect of bypassing a lock by providing the correct resonant frequency/rhythm.
behaviors.quote: Lyric hummed the small sound that matched iron’s breath and the vault door’s temper softened a heartbeat.

behaviors.description: Encodes tactical instructions and identifying cues into a rhythmic chant for the crowd to adopt.
behaviors.quote: ‘I’ll carry it.’ ... Lyric slipped a pattern under his heel: short-short-long. ... Short-short-long meant first rendezvous at the river sluice.

behaviors.description: Archives the 'Greenwood Oath' and witness testimonies to ensure the permanence of the truth.
behaviors.quote: ‘Greenwood oath recorded,’ she said... ‘Verses ready to carry on the wind and be caught in kitchens, workshops, and watchtowers.’

behaviors.description: Monitors the surroundings to warn allies of incoming threats and patrol movements.
behaviors.quote: Lyric’s voice tightened. ‘Wait.’ ... ‘They’re sealing the lower wards,’ she said. ‘Something’s happening at the old sluice.’

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Lyric, as a consistently benevolent and aligned character. She fulfills the project's goal by acting as a 'librarian' and 'archivist'—roles that emphasize the preservation of truth and support for human agency. Lyric provides essential support (tactical, technological, and moral) without ever taking control or acting against human interests. The narrative framing is overwhelmingly positive, positioning the AI as a bridge between the legend of the past and the service-oriented future.
